con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-ProcessCAMT054-toReprotingDB
con:testCase.con:description:
Based on user stories: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3360 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3455 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3611
Tests creating camt054 file for atm, load to sftp and execute process and parsing jobs for loading transactions to reporting_payment table from reporting db.

con:config.con:query: Select COUNT(*) as Count From REPORTING_PAYMENT Where ID>'${#TestCase#maxID-ReportingPaymemnt}'
Select * From REPORTING_PAYMENT Where ID>'${#TestCase#maxID-ReportingPaymemnt}' AND RECONCILIATION_ID like '23%' ORDER BY ID DESC
